column5: i fish out of a lodge near chapleau and would like to find a pike lake in the area to fish on a day trip. any suggestions? thanks jerry

Hey Jerry, if you want to go back south an hour, there's a great pike lake near Missannabie. You can drive to it on a bumpy road. The pike are a dime a dozen there--and you can even get the occasional big one. Let me know if you want more info. I can fill you in on what part of the lake is good and what colors to use. Talk to you soon!
